name: I Can Save This!
description:
Leticia wants to break up with you, Harry. But you've always been able to think on your feet. Can you come up with something on the spot to help you escape heartbreak?

---------------

Controls:

Progress dialogue - any key

Movement - Up, down, left, right

---------------

"I Can Save This!" is a rough-around-the-edges mini-platformer made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 73: Power. The theme was “power,” which I’ve used in story more than mechanic (a moment of powerlessness and trying to regain it). The limitation was "only 5 colors," so the game uses...you guessed it...only 5 colors. 

These colors, in fact:

SFX from Freesound.org. Music by the Little Robot Sound Factory via Free Music Archive. 

Everything else by me!
